titles.title: Cooper Davis Act
Cooper Davis Act

A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to require electronic communication service providers and remote computing services to report to the Attorney General the unlawful sale and distribution of controlled substances.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Cooper Davis Act
This bill establishes requirements for electronic communication service providers and remote computing service providers to report knowledge of various drug-related offenses (e.g., unlawful distribution of a controlled substance) to the Drug Enforcement Administration.
